data.name: Grand Opening of Aviator Pizza & Drafthouse (Austin Location)
data.description:
Come celebrate the grand opening of Aviator Pizza and Drafthouse on Saturday, March 4th from 11am to 11pm. Enjoy a special menu, pizza samples, free dessert and live music by Silas Lowe.
Aviator Pizza is proud to donate a percentage of proceeds from the day to Austin Pets Alive.
Live music from Silas Lowe starts at 5:00 pm.

RSVP here. We'd love if you could join us! It really should be a ton of fun!

The highlight of Aviator Pizza’s menu is the hand-tossed pizza dough. Created with a 26-year old family yeast strain, once the dough is baked, the crispy sourdough crust is then brushed with the restaurant’s in-house, rosemary-infused pizza oil.  

The South Congress location’s menu will offer favorites from the Elgin restaurant as well as a variety of fresh menu items.  New pizza topping selections include prosciutto, arugula, freshly made mozzarella, locally made goat cheese, Texas grown heirloom tomatoes and brussel sprouts marinated in honey Sriracha sauce, to name a few. Also available on the robust menu are gluten free pizzas, garlic and cheese focaccia sticks, chicken wings, sandwiches, salads, calzones, and desserts.

Aviator Pizza is proud to work with local farms and producers including Fallen Oak Mushrooms, Good Flow Honey, Mozzarella Co., Elgin Heirlooms, Francis & Thatcher Farms, Vital Farms and Yegua Creek Farms, along with many others.

In addition to the food menu, Aviator Pizza’s South Congress location will have an extensive rotating beer and wine list featuring 24 Texas craft beers and six wines on tap. A few of the Texas craft beers available include Big Bend, Thirsty Planet, Deep Ellum Brewing, Adelbert’s Brewery, Independence Brewing, Beta Brewing and Austin Eastciders. The South Congress location will also offer growler re-fills of any brew on tap.

About Aviator Pizza Brew Company & Aviator Pizza & Drafthouse
Started in 2014 in Elgin, TX by John McElroy and Dr. Ana Lam-McElroy, Aviator Pizza offers high quality, craft pizza, Texas craft beer and select wines. Perfect for families and our four-legged friends, the restaurant’s casual and welcoming environment makes it the perfect neighborhood hang-out. Now with two locations, you can enjoy Aviator Pizza in Elgin at 18810 Highway 290 Highway East, Elgin, TX 78621 or on Austin’s bustling S. Congress at 6501 S Congress Ave #105, Austin, TX 78745. To learn more about the restaurants, please visit AviatorPizza.com or follow along on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter.

data.name: Art From The Heart
data.description:
Incredible opportunity to view and purchase works from Miami’s world renowned artists and talented emerging artists. 100% of the proceeds from the art purchased that evening will go towards building a better tomorrow for 1,200 children who are healing from abuse, neglect and abandonment.  $50 advanced tickets ($60 at the door) guarantees an evening of artful inspiration for a great cause.  
We are expecting 350 guests who will enjoy an open bar, music and delicious passed hors d oeuvres c/o Miami’s premier chefs.
The event committee has been successful at securing donations from local and international artists and including graffiti artists who will showcase their craft live that evening.  This exciting event will be one of the premiere events of the year.   
All proceeds will benefit FRC, which help with the care and resources of all children from the very young up through the teenagers in the program, which are often overlooked in the foster care and adoption system.  With more than 300 guests in attendance last year, we hope to make this event even greater to raise the funds badly needed to support these children in our community.

data.name: Funky Fridays at St. Elmo's Brewery
data.description:
St. Elmo’s Brewery will be hosting a “Funky Friday” concert series featuring local funk bands for the month of June. This Friday, Jade and the Foxtones will kick of the series at 8 p.m. followed by Kev Bev Collins and the Woodland Creatures. 

Below is the schedule of performers. This event is free to attend and open to the public. For more information please visit our event page.

June Line Up: 

June 2nd: 
8:00 pm Jade and the Foxtones 
9:30 pm Kev Bev Collins and the Woodland Creatures 
June 9th: 
8:00 pm The Selfless Lovers
June 16th:
 8:00 pm The Selfless Lovers
June 23rd: 
8:00 pm Kali Haat 
9:30 pm Kev Bev Collins and the Woodland Creatures 
June 30th: 
8:00 pm Oscar Ornelas

data.name: Barrington Brew Fest
data.description: With nearly 50 brewers showcasing more than 90 different brews, Barrington’s Brew Fest has become the foremost beer fest in the Northwest suburbs!

data.name: Emerald Coast Beer Festival
data.description:
Once again, the Emerald Coast Beer Festival™ returns to the world famous "Rosie O' Grady's Good Time Emporium" entertainment complex in Seville Quarter. There are seven different rooms and two courtyards, each dedicated to its own unique style of entertainment. This is the best street party in Pensacola!

On Thursday September 7, 2017 the beer pairing dinner will be held in the Apple Annie's Room, and Friday September 8, 2017 the beer tasting will take place through out the entire complex and Government Street.
data.venueName: Rosie O' Grady's Good Time Emporium

data.name: Great Lakes Brew Fest
data.description: The Great Lakes Brew Fest features unlimited sampling of more than 250 craft beers and sodas from nearly 100 brewers on the beautiful shore of Lake Michigan. All paid attendees will receive a souvenir tasting glass. Food served by local restaurants will be available for purchase. The festival also features live music including performances by the world renowned Kilties Drum and Bugle Corps.

data.name: Fall Fest-Of-Ale
data.description: The Janesville Kiwanis Fall Fest-Of-Ale is a premiere beer tasting event bringing together some of the finest microbrews in Wisconsin and Illinois.
